messages.subject: response to thoughts on emails
messages.msgSnippet: PSoroosh@aol.com wrote: No stranger on an email list really MATTERS enough to me that I would get hurt by anything they say. I just take what they say as
messages.messageBody:
PSoroosh@... wrote:
No stranger on an email list really MATTERS enough to me that I would get "hurt" by anything they say. I just take what they say as input - as
something to consider. I appreciate ideas that shake me up a little - that are strong and clear and don't pussyfoot around the point.

Hi all
I just had to say that this is exactly how I feel. I have only posted a few times on this list but I read with interest as much as I can. I am unschooling and love it. I also love the feel of community we are trying to build here.
I just wanted to add in my 2 cents to the topic.
God bless
Vivian
Mom to three Happy little Monkeys
Austin 10/31/93 Sarah 8/28/95 Emmalee 8/15/00
And loving wife to Randy

**If fifty million people say a foolish thing, it is still a foolish thing.
-Anatole France***




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
